channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Old wooden settee frame dumped on pavement outside Dominos Pizza at junction if Gloucester Rd and Queens Road, 6th May
item.description:
It has been there months and is unsightly.can it be removed please?
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 264, Gloucester Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Tree not replaced, 6th May
item.description:
Outside No. 30 Langdon Road

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 23, Langdon Road, Naunton, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: Tree causing damage/obstruction to pavement or road

item.title: TMC - Defects - Signs & Street Furniture problem, 6th May
item.description:
2 HOUR WITH GIVE AN TAKE PLEASE BRING X4 2 METER BARRIERS OUT AN X8 SANDBAGS AND PLACE AROUND DAMAGED BT COVER PLEASE NOTE THE 2 BARRIERS ON FLOOR WILL NEED TO BE CUT OF COVER WITH SNIPS to make safe (Damaged Street Furniture)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -CW6 Potholes problem, 6th May
item.description:
28 day with 3 way stop and go carriageway pothole 1400x500x40mm tarmac patch required. (CW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet
